data.title: Covid-MAP
data.subTitle: map project
data.description:
Project to show the location of venues associated with confirmed COVID-19 cases that have been classified by NSW Health for action. 
 It show the closet location from your position using the browser location api

data.title: Latitud Náutica
data.subTitle: E-Commerce
data.description: This project is made in Next.js with an REST API in Express.js using a MYSQL database and sequelize.js as ORM. With a custom CMS to upload and edit the products

data.title: More Clean
data.subTitle: Landing Page
data.description: Institutional website of a small business in Argentina. Made in React.js with style-components and hosted in a shared hosting with a setup of emails and google analytics

data.title: Alfredes
data.subTitle: Institutional Website
data.description: Institutional website of a rental of a cabin in the delta of Buenos Aires, Made in React.js.js with style-components

data.title: Club Náutico San Martin
data.subTitle: Institutional Website
data.description: Institutional website of a sailing club, with a cms system made in PHP to manage booking of services, it also has a page with real time data of the tide on the club.
